description: This restaurant is part of one of the best food outlets in Rome, which offers delicacies such as typical Roman pastas, cooked and raw fish, meat, an impressive selection of cured hams and cheeses, as well as top-quality ingredients such as anchovies and mozzarella. Excellent home-baked bread and a varied wine list complete the picture. Make sure you book ahead, as it’s hard to get a table here without a reservation.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
